usage_rules.h1: text-5xl md:text-7xl font-serif tracking-tight leading-[1.1] text-primary-900
usage_rules.h2: text-3xl md:text-5xl font-serif tracking-tight text-primary-900 mb-6
usage_rules.h3: text-xl md:text-2xl font-sans font-semibold tracking-normal text-primary-800
usage_rules.caption: text-sm font-mono tracking-wider uppercase text-stone-500

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Manrope:wght@400;500;700&family=Spectral:ital,wght@0,300;0,400;0,600;1,400&display=swap');

grid_systems.bento_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6 auto-rows-[minmax(200px,auto)]

buttons.primary: bg-teal-700 text-white hover:bg-teal-800 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-all duration-300 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-teal-900 border border-stone-200 hover:border-teal-700 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-all duration-300
buttons.ghost: text-stone-600 hover:text-teal-700 hover:bg-teal-50 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-colors

cards.base: bg-white border border-stone-100 rounded-2xl p-8 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300
cards.feature: bg-stone-50/50 border border-stone-200 rounded-xl p-6 hover:bg-white transition-colors

inputs.base: bg-stone-50 border-stone-200 focus:border-teal-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-teal-500/20 rounded-lg h-12 px-4 transition-all

navigation.wrapper: fixed top-0 left-0 right-0 z-50 px-6 py-4
navigation.container: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 rounded-full shadow-sm px-8 py-3 flex items-center justify-between max-w-5xl mx-auto

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure text meets APCA standards. Use stone-900 on teal-50. Use white on teal-700.
accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-label if no text label is present.

do_not: Do not use gradients for text.
Do not center text by default (use left align for readability).
Do not use generic stock photos of shaking hands.
must_do: Add micro-interactions to every button and card.

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-end Medical Association website. It must feel like a mix of a prestigious university and a modern tech company. Use the 'Spectral' font for that academic authority. Use 'Deep Teal' to ground the design in medical trust. Break the grid with the 'Bento' layout for news and events. Do not make it look like a Bootstrap template. Be bold with whitespace.
